name: Endlesscutter
description: Guide for the Endlesscutter: from an AI-generated image to a print-ready 3D model using Makerworld and a slicer of your choice.

sections.title: 1. From AI Graphic to 3D Model with Makerworld (MakerLab – Image to 3D)

steps.title: Create a Design with an AI
steps.text: First, create a suitable design using an AI of your choice. Make sure the image has clear contours and strong contrast (ideally with a white studio background) so it can later be converted cleanly into a 3D model.

steps.title: Open Makerworld and Start MakerLab
steps.text: Visit makerworld.com, log in, and navigate to the “MakerLab” section in the top menu. Open the “Image to 3D” generator there.

steps.title: Upload Image and Generate 3D Model
steps.text: Upload your previously created AI image into the “Image to 3D” generator. Start the conversion and wait until the 3D model has been generated automatically.

steps.title: Download the Model as STL or 3MF
steps.text: Once the 3D model is ready, you can save it in your desired format. Choose between STL or 3MF and download the file to your computer.

sections.title: 2. Insert Endless Flexi Cutter as a Negative Part in the Slicer

steps.title: Open Model in Slicer and Select “Add negative part”
steps.text: Open your downloaded model in a slicer of your choice (e.g. Bambu Studio, Orca Slicer, Anycubic Slicer, Creality Slicer, etc.). Right-click on the main object and select “Add negative part”. Then insert the Endless Flexi Cutter, which you can download at the very bottom of this page. (Note: Negative parts aren't printed-they are subtracted from the model. This makes it possible to generate joints and cutouts directly in the slicer.)

steps.title: Precisely Position the Negative Part
steps.text: Position the negative part precisely within the model. Use your slicer’s transformation tools to move, rotate, or scale the object until it sits exactly where you need it.

steps.title: Slice and Print
steps.text: Now perform the slicing process and check the preview. If everything looks correct, start the print and produce your Endlesscutter model.

links.label: Download Endless Flexi Cutter
links.note: Opens the 3D viewer with a download option for the negative model (STL).
